arm_group.description: During arthroscopic shoulder surgery, an SCD device will be applied to the patients legs during surgery. Cerebral oxygenation and circulatory parameters will be recorded continuously throughout the surgery. Recordings will be hidden to the primary caregiver.

During arthroscopic shoulder surgery, TED stockings will be applied to the patients legs during surgery. Cerebral oxygenation and circulatory parameters will be recorded continuously throughout the surgery. Recordings will be hidden to the primary caregiver.
no stockings will be applied to the patients legs

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is a 3-legged randomized study examining whether during shoulder surgery
      performed in the beach chair position active compressions of the lower leg with a sequential
      compression device (SCD) have a superior effect on stabilizing cerebral and circulatory
      hemodynamics when compared to TED stockings or a control group without any stockings.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sequential Compression Device (SCD) for Stabilizing Hemodynamics in the Beach Chair Position

detailed_description.textblock:
This study examines whether during shoulder surgery performed in the beach chair position
      active compressions of the lower leg with a sequential compression device (SCD) have a
      superior effect on stabilizing cerebral and circulatory hemodynamics when compared to TED
      stockings or a control group without any stockings.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  adult patients undergoing elective shoulder surgery

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  untreated hypertension

          -  no pulse in a. dorsalis pedis or a.tibialis posterior

          -  leg ulcers

          -  failed scalenous blockade

intervention.description: a sequential compression device will be applied to the legs
TED stockings will be applied to the patients legs during surgery

clinical_study.official_title: Stabilizing Cerebral and Circulatory Hemodynamics During Shoulder Surgery in the Beach Chair Position Using Sequential Compression Device (SCD) or TED Stockings Compared to a Control Group
